3. Solution reveal (25‑45s): Introduce ThreatShield with tagline "AI‑driven vigilance".
4. Feature highlights (45‑70s): Briefly showcase the four key features with supporting stats.
5. Call‑to‑action (70‑90s): Encourage demo request, stress ROI, and compliance benefits.

messages.content:
Full script (90 s):

**[0‑10 s]**
*Visual: fast‑moving montage of global news headlines about cyber attacks.*
Narrator (energetic, authoritative): “Every second, a new cyber threat emerges, targeting your data, your reputation, and your bottom line.”

**[10‑25 s]**
*Visual: IT Director staring at a dashboard filled with alerts.*
Narrator: “As an IT Director, you juggle tight budgets, relentless compliance mandates, and a threat landscape that evolves faster than any update cycle.”
*On‑screen text*: “Budget • Compliance • Threat Velocity”.

**[25‑45 s]**
*Visual: sleek animation of the ThreatShield logo forming from data streams.*
Narrator: “Meet ThreatShield – AI‑driven vigilance that detects anomalies the moment they appear.”
*Tagline on screen*: “AI‑Powered. Real‑Time. Unmatched.”

**[45‑70 s]**
*Feature 1 – Real‑time anomaly detection* (15 s):
Narrator: “Detect 95 % of threats within seconds, before they can breach your perimeter.”
*Graphic: threat vector intercepted.*

*Feature 2 – Behavioral analytics* (10 s):
Narrator: “Behavioral analytics cuts false positives by 40 %, letting your team focus on true risks.”
*Graphic: baseline vs. anomalous behavior.*

*Feature 3 – Automated incident response* (10 s):
Narrator: “Automated playbooks shrink response time from hours to minutes, mitigating damage instantly.”
*Graphic: automated isolation of compromised endpoint.*

*Feature 4 – Compliance reporting dashboard* (10 s):
Narrator: “One‑click compliance reports streamline audits for GDPR, HIPAA, and PCI‑DSS.”
*Graphic: unified dashboard with export button.*

**[70‑90 s]**
*Visual: confident IT Director presenting to C‑suite.*
Narrator: “Ready to protect your organization, demonstrate ROI, and stay audit‑ready? Request a live demo of ThreatShield today and turn vulnerability into resilience.”
*On‑screen CTA*: “Schedule Your Demo → www.threatshield.com/demo"

---
End of script.
The script is ready. I’ll now extract SEO‑friendly keywords and export the script as a PDF.
